edge_1: Pinocchio is created by Geppetto as a puppet based on his deceased son. Geppetto wishes for Pinocchio to come alive and the Blue Fairy grants his wish.
edge_2: Geppetto sends Pinocchio to school, but when he fails to come home for dinner, Geppetto and his pets go out looking for him.
edge_3: Pinocchio is created by Geppetto as a puppet based on his deceased son. Geppetto wishes for Pinocchio to come alive and the Blue Fairy grants his wish.

edge_3: The Blue Fairy brings Pinocchio to life and appoints Jiminy Cricket as his conscience.

edge_1: Pinocchio is created by Geppetto as a puppet based on his deceased son. Geppetto wishes for Pinocchio to come alive and the Blue Fairy grants his wish.
edge_2: Geppetto sends Pinocchio to school, but when he fails to come home for dinner, Geppetto and his pets go out looking for him.
edge_3: Pinocchio declined the offer of joining Fabiana and Sabina, who told him that Stromboli had been arrested by the Carabinieri for cruelty against his employees.

edge_1: Pinocchio is created by Geppetto as a puppet based on his deceased son. Geppetto wishes for Pinocchio to come alive and the Blue Fairy grants his wish.
edge_2: When Pinocchio and Geppetto were swallowed by Monstro, Believing his father has died, Pinocchio mourned over him. However, a magical tear fell from Pinocchio's eye on Geppetto, reviving him. Geppetto told Pinocchio that despite being a puppet, he had proven himself to be a true boy at heart as they departed for home.

edge_1: Monstro swallowed Pinocchio and Geppetto while they were trying to save Geppetto. They took refuge in a giant boat inside Monstro's stomach, and Pinocchio came up with the idea to make him sneeze by starting a fire within him. The plan worked, and Monstro sneezed them out, but he gave chase that ended with the group crashing on dry land.

edge_1: In the end, Jiminy narrated that stories have been told of Pinocchio becoming a real boy, but didn't confirm them (even as Pinocchio's limbs appeared to turn human), stressing that, in his heart, Pinocchio is already a real boy.
